description.value: You can't voluntarily come within 10 feet of brandished mirror or the sound of ringing handbells. creature can Interact with a mirror or handbell to brandish or ring that item for 1 round (similar to Raising a Shield). If you involuntarily come within 10 feet of an object of your revulsion, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition, running from the subject of your revulsion until you end an action beyond 10 feet of it. After 1 round of being exposed to the subject of your revulsion, you can attempt a @Check[will|dc:25] save as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. On a success, you overcome your revulsions for [[/r 1d6 #Overcome Revulsion Duration]]{1d6 rounds}, or 1 hour on a critical success.
